front.title: IPv6 Services for UPnP Residential Networks

abstract.t: This paper considers some IPv6 issues for residential networks, including address scoping and firewalls. The paper describes IPv6 usage in the UPnP Forums's Device Architecture standard; some clarifications and changes are considered. The paper seeks comments on IPv6 address usage, address selection, and the need to develop best practices for IPv6 firewall traversal.
